Plot: Randy is still unfocused after 2 years in college. When his dad refuses to keep paying his tuition, he gets a job delivering pizzas. Several alluring cougars pay him $200 for pizza delivery and "services rendered." As for their hu...

Plot: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink P...

title: Yellow One, The

title: Tickle Me
Plot: A singing rodeo rider gets hired at an expensive all-female dude ranch/beauty spa and falls for a pretty fitness trainer who's under constant threat from a gang who wants her late grandfather's cache of gold that's hidden in a gho...

Plot: Tarzan secretly arrives in Blue Valley, the land of the magical fountain of youth, to find the intrepid aviatrix who can save an innocent man. But, is she the same person she used to be? Can Tarzan protect the vale's ultimate myst...

title: Come to the Stable

title: Flying Saucer, The

title: Tarzan's Peril

title: Lovely to Look at
Plot: Three Broadway producers struggling to get backing for their show, hope one's sudden inheritance of a half interest in a Parisian fashion house is the answer. They travel to Paris only to learn the salon is in debt and requires th...

title: High Noon
Plot: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon tr...

title: Ivanhoe

title: Salome

title: I Confess

title: Big Heat, The

Plot: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

title: Fear and Desire
Plot: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

title: Pickup on South Street
Plot: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

title: Glen or Glenda
Plot: A psychiatrist tells the stories of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda) and a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

title: Wild One, The

title: Beast from 20,000 Fathoms, The

title: Naked Spur, The

title: Phffft

title: To Catch a Thief

title: Night of the Hunter, The

title: Lady and the Tramp

title: Daddy Long Legs
Plot: A wealthy American has a chance encounter with a joyful young French woman, and anonymously pays for her education. She writes letters to her mysterious benefactor, nicknaming him from the description given by some of her fellow o...

title: Bride of the Monster

title: Tarantula

title: Wrong Man, The

title: Gunslinger

title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers

title: Court Jester, The

title: Bigger Than Life

title: Unguarded Moment, The

title: Autumn Leaves
Plot: A lonely middle-aged woman meets a younger man, but their relationship is threatened after the man's troubled past reveals itself.

title: Baby Doll
Plot: An immature, naive teenage bride holds her anxious husband at bay while flirting with an amorous Sicilian farmer.

title: Giant
Plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

title: Desk Set

title: Incredible Shrinking Man, The
Plot: After Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

title: Paths of Glory
Plot: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

title: Old Yeller
Plot: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon belo...

title: Three Faces of Eve
Plot: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

title: Funny Face
Plot: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

title: Enemy Below, The
Plot: During WWII an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, and in the ensuing duel the American captain must draw upon all his experience to defeat the equally experienced German commander.

title: Sweet Smell of Success

title: Fire Down Below

title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
Plot: During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another while hoping for a rescue, as they try to avoid capture by the J...

title: Sayonara

title: Tammy and the Bachelor
Plot: An unsophisticated young woman from the Mississippi swamps falls in love with an unconventional southern gentleman.

title: Bridge on the River Kwai, The

title: Prince and the Showgirl, The

title: An Affair to Remember

title: A Face in the Crowd

title: Sorority Girl

title: Kronos

title: Vikings, The

title: Run Silent Run Deep

title: Adventures of Gerard, The
Plot: Based on satirical short stories by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle about a vain, egotistical Etienne Gerard, a French brigadier serving during the Napoleonic Wars. He thinks he's the best soldier and lover that ever lived and intends to p...

title: Une belle fille comme moi
Plot: Young sociologist Stanislas Previne is preparing a thesis on criminal women. He meets Camille Bliss in prison to interview her. Camille is accused of murdering her husband Clovis and her lover Arthur She tells Stanislas about her ...

title: L'aventure, c'est l'aventure
Plot: When they realize the times are changing, five crooks decide to switch from bank robberies to personality abductions. Among their hostages are singer Johnny Hallyday and an ambassador in Latin America. They get framed by a guerril...
